title: Vivaldi: the Four Seasons
creator_credit: Allan Miller, Eitan Even, Harry Waterson, Le'an Films and Elkins Organization
brief_description: A stunnning performance of Vivaldi’s Four Seasons by violinists Isaac Stern (Spring), Pinchas Zukerman (Summer), Shlomo Mintz (Autumn), Itzhak Perlman (Winter) supported by the Israel Philharmonic Orchestra and conducted by Zubin Mehta as part of the Huberman Festival staged at the Frederick R. Mann Auditorium, Tel Aviv in 1983. This truly beautiful music is interspersed with acompanying images of Israel and Palestine depicting the mood of each of the seasons.
